getSignData
Function for getting certificate data used in forming visual electronic signature stamp of PDF files.
The function is intended for use in algorithmic type setting:
"Configuring file signing actions in the browser” [BROWSER_SIGN_ACTION_SET];
“Setting up an action to sign files” [FS_SIGN_ACT_SETTINGS].
Syntax
getSignData
(obj)
Setting
Purpose
obj
Certificate field to be added to the visual electronic signature stamp of PDF files.
The selection is made from the objects of “Certificate imprint” type.
Note
The function is called from the
“Additional” tab
of the algorithm editor toolbar.
When the function is called, a modal window will be displayed to select one of the certificate fields.
Use example
When signing a document using CryptoPro, the visual electronic signature stamp should use certificate data such as certificate serial number, signer, certificate issuance and expiration dates and indicate who issued the certificate.
To do this, when configuring the additional parameters
actions of signing a file using CryptoPro

getting certificate data is done by calling the
getSignData
function and then selecting the required certificate field.
